title: Develop Bid Strategy for Renewable Auction
description: A developer is participating in a government auction for renewable energy capacity and needs to develop a competitive bid price.

tasks.description: Analyze the results of previous renewable energy auctions in the same market, noting the clearing prices and bid competition levels.
Calculate the minimum bid price (the project's LCOE) required for the project to be financially viable.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent determines the floor price for the bid.

tasks.description: Develop a bid strategy that maximizes the chance of winning while maintaining an acceptable profit margin.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent recommends a specific bid price that is slightly above the calculated LCOE but below historical clearing prices.

tasks.description: Submit the final bid to the auction platform.
